name: ARCADIA (itch) (Jeah™)
description:
Between every two pines, there is a doorway to a new world - John Muir.

The world is currently struggling. As the COVID-19 pandemic has spread and refuses to ease, both children and parents alike now face a stressful and anxiety-provoking situation, but we now offer you a virtual place of peace - ARCADIA. 

Through colour, music and mechanics, ARCADIA comes alive and becomes your very own customisable playground. Fly, find and frolick in a bright and positive space that you may enter and leave as you like. 

Our game is specifically targeted towards children/youth diagnosed with ADHD/ADD and similar disorders, but everyone is welcome to explore the world of ARCADIA.
